|802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = 192.168.254.254 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = |manuf = Askey |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 09/2005 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "3015-002182" and a date code of '''0535''' is silkscreened :on the board of one particular unit. "SIEMENS SUBSCRIBER NETWORKS", "2004", "034-4240-002", :and "(Rev B)" is etched onto the bottom of the board. '''[[Askey]]''' is presumed to manufacture this device. ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/siemens-speedstream-4100-adsl122-router-318 On '''SpeedGuide.net'''] ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts====
